sqls.sql: select t.id ,t.content,t.inputtime,t.title,t.contenttxt as contenttxt,t.userid,aa.username as publisher1 from PLATFORM_NOTICE t left join platform_user aa on aa.id=t.userid where 1=1 <#if key["t.name"]??> and t.title like :t.name </#if> <#if key["t.content"]??> and t.contentTxt like :t.content </#if> <#if key["sort"]??> order by ${key["sort"]} ${key["order"]} <#else> order by t.inputtime desc </#if>
delete from platform_notice where id in (:id)
